text: Gerd Schädlich (30 December 1952 – 29 January 2022) was a German football player and manager. He was most known for managing East German professional teams Erzgebirge Aue and Chemnitzer FC. His playing career lasted from 1972 until 1976 and he only played for Chemnitzer. His managing career lasted from 1978 until 2013. Schädlich was born in Rodewisch, then-East Germany. Schädlich died after a long illness on 29 January 2022, at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German footballers Category:German football managers Category:Sportspeople from Saxony
title: Gerd Schädlich
